flawed_nl_solution:
In 5 days, 2 * 5 = <<2*5=10>>10 peaches will ripen.
Three were eaten, so there will be 14 - 3 = <<14-3=13>>13 ripe peaches left.
There are 18 - 14 = <<18-14=4>>4 unripe peaches left.
Therefore, there will be 13 - 4 = <<13-4=9>>9 more ripe peaches than unripe peaches in the bowl after five days.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
